channel.title: Journal format suggestions?
channel.description:
Was wondering if you guys have found a good way to write your nightly logs in the journal so that they're easy to read and follow when you have to copy and paste them into chat. I'm finding when I see peoples pasted journal I have to take time to distinguish what goes with which night and spacing runs together. I'm trying to make nightly logs in my journal that are easy to read and don't all run together when pasted. For example:
[n1] flirt 12- social support. /// [n2] flirt 3- killer offensive. ///
Or
[n1] flirt 12- social support.......... [n2] flirt 3- killer offensive...........
I found those work better than nothing but was wondering if anybody has come up with anything that makes it REALLY easy to read their pasted nightly logs. Thanks!

item.title: Journal format suggestions?
item.dc:creator: Aurelia
item.description:
Or Use my Style

N1: Checked 01 - Offensive/Killer

N1): Killed 02

Read full topic

item.title: Journal format suggestions?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Try using Brackets
[N1 - flirt 12- social support][N2 - flirt 3- killer offensive]

Read full topic

item.title: Journal format suggestions?
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
Was wondering if you guys have found a good way to write your nightly logs in the journal so that they’re easy to read and follow when you have to copy and paste them into chat. I’m finding when I see peoples pasted journal I have to take time to distinguish what goes with which night and spacing runs together. I’m trying to make nightly logs in my journal that are easy to read and don’t all run together when pasted. For example:

[n1] flirt 12- social support. ///
[n2] flirt 3- killer offensive. ///

Or

[n1] flirt 12- social support…
[n2] flirt 3- killer offensive…

I found those work better than nothing but was wondering if anybody has come up with anything that makes it REALLY easy to read their pasted nightly logs. Thanks!
